fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - The King: Your role is Revealed at the beginning of the game as simply "King". Any attempt to check your role, even your True role, will show up as "King" as well. You start with 6 HP and your Hand Size is 6. You cannot participate in Duels.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Guards: Play Block! on an attack directed at you of your choice. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Doctors: Play a Heal! OR play a Cleanse! on yourself. [2 uses, 1 CD] 
- Restrain: Prevent a player from using more than 1 card next phase (including (Reforged) cards played upon them). [1 use, Unique]
- Retreat: Go to the Kingâ€™s Quarters the following Night phase. [1 use, Unique] 
- Evaluate: Pick a player. Learn if they win with you at the end of the phase (Susceptible). [1 use, Astral, Unique, Unlocks D3]
